title: The UK's first official gay Pride March
description: The UK’s first official gay Pride march took place 50 years ago - 1st July 1972. Alex Collins talks to Ted Brown who took part in the London march. Photo - Ted Brown taken in 1971
itunes:subtitle: The UK’s first official gay Pride march took place 50 years ago – on 1st July 1972.
itunes:summary: The UK’s first official gay Pride march took place 50 years ago - 1st July 1972. Alex Collins talks to Ted Brown who took part in the London march. Photo - Ted Brown taken in 1971
itunes:author: BBC World Service
